message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. I figure it's a fair starting point, considering I'm taking the risk of going first.
I'm willing to give you a decent chunk, but I think I should get more since I'm not getting the benefit of being the first proposer. This is a fair compromise.
Okay, I see your point about being the second proposer.  Let's try a 70/30 split in my favor.  I'm willing to compromise, but I'm also not going to give away the farm.
I'm not willing to give up that much more. I think 50/50 is a fair split, considering the reduced value of the money due to inflation. This is my final offer.
